<a id="class_AudioBusLayout"></a>

# AudioBusLayout

**Inherits:** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Stores information about the audio buses.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Stores position, muting, solo, bypass, effects, effect position, volume, and the connections between buses. See [AudioServer](class_audioserver.md) for usage.
